Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add reference implementation specs

Six spec-driven development specifications for building the Weblet
reference implementation:

- cli.spec.md: CLI tool, commands, APP.md parsing, discovery
- runtime.spec.md: Bun server, static serving, API routes
- dependencies.spec.md: URL imports, vendoring, install strategy
- storage.spec.md: Ephemeral and persistent storage management
- agent-context.spec.md: Agent Context API for agent-app communication
- examples.spec.md: Reference weblet implementations

Each spec includes:
- Functional and non-functional requirements
- Interface/API definitions
- Behavior descriptions
- Error handling
- Acceptance criteria
- Test scenarios

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
